roleset.name: achieve less than some benchmark

example.name: intransitive
example.text: It also rewards people who underachieve -LRB- hence , " waste " a degree -RRB- as they do not have to repay their debt if they never earn above L 21,000 .

example.name: both args
example.text: How can someone who underachieved on the SAT score 680 - 700 on the GMAT ?

example.name: arg0
example.text: With this in mind , I would suggest a far harsher view on the foreign elites -LRB- and their tendency to avoid tax -RRB- and more importantly to tackle white under - achievement in the schools and workplace .

roleset.note: UNDERACHIEVE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from underachieve.01-v)
UNDERACHIEVEMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from underachievement.01-n)
